text: Maaje ɗen ɗiɗi fotataa: [Ndiyam] goo ɗoo ɗam, ko welɗam, laaɓungo, newiingo njaram mun, ngoo ɗaa, ko lanɗam haaɗuɗam. Hiɗon ñaama e kala majjam, teewu keccu, hiɗon yaltina kadi hen, cuɗaari ndi ɓoornotoɗon. Hiɗa yi'a laaɗe ɗen no awja e maggo, fii yo on ɗaɓɓiron e ɓural Makko. Belajoo on yettay [Mo]
